column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. SPLASH ONE BANDIT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. THE RESUPPLY TRUCK HAS BEEN DESTROYED. NEW ORDERS HEAD TO THE TANK BASE AND GRAB SOME AMMO FROM THERE. GOOD LUCK. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK ONE TO PAPA BEAR. HIND JUST TOOK OUT OUR M113. WE NEED SOME URGENT BACKUP IN THE TANK BASE. DO YOU COPY. OVER.
I AM AT THE DOCKS. ALPHA BLACK HAS BEEN RESUPPLIED. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. SEEMS LIKE THATS ALL OF THEM. PAPA BEAR OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO BRAVO. KEEP YOUR HEADS DOWN. WE ARE GETTING YOU SOME ASSISTANCE. OVER.
